metadata.Title: CVE-2021-46195 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - low.
metadata.Description: GCC v12.0 was discovered to contain an uncontrolled recursion via the component libiberty/rust-demangle.c. This vulnerability allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service (DoS) by consuming excessive CPU and memory resources.

notes.Note: sbeattie> gcc-3.3 only provides libstdc++5 eslerm> rust-demangle.c not present until gcc-7 litios> affected function introduced in gcc-11 mdeslaur> This is the same CVE as CVE-2021-3530, but applied to GCC GCC fix is https://gcc.gnu.org/git/gitweb.cgi?p=gcc.git;h=f10bec5ffa487ad3033ed5f38cfd0fc7d696deab
